name: Button March
description:
Button March is single button game created for The Fun Button Jam.

In this game arrows only follow the single answer of maths, so, any wrong answer will do player damage. 

Game play Instructions

  • In this game you have to break through opponent gates with your siege ram while protecting yourself by neutralizing the enemy arrows.
  • On upper left corner there will be a slider which will show 3 options and one of which is the number of arrows fired by enemies.
  • You have to click the Fun button by timing the right option to shoot the same amount of arrow as enemy
  • If you shoot more or less arrows, the extras will hurt you.
  • You will get score according to number of arrows neutralized.
  • There will also be a mathematical hint when enemy shoots arrow to make it easier to find the number of arrows without counting them all in the moment.
